seo_keywords: Shark NV356E brush roll not spinning

problems.title: Split Hose / Loss of Suction
problems.description: Hissing sound and no suction from the floor nozzle. Usually a tear in the handle hose.
solution_steps: Inspect the short hose connecting the handle to the wand.
If torn, you don't need a new vacuum, just a replacement handle assembly.
Check the foam filters under the dust cup.

problems.title: Brush Roll Not Spinning
problems.description: The green light on the nozzle is off or red.
solution_steps: Ensure switch is set to II (Brushroll On).
Check the small lower hose on the floor nozzle for cracks.
If the nozzle hose is split, you need a specific repair part or new nozzle.
